name: European Container Glass Federation
goal:
The Association's objective - to the exclusion of any commercial and lucrative activities - shall be the representation of the common interests from the economic and technical points of view, of the container glass and of the mechanical domestic glass industry, at international level.

In order to attain its objective, the Association may exercise the following activities, among others:
a)the defence and promotion of container glass;
b)the study of the problems of container glass, inter alia:
∙the improvement and development of container glass products, inter alia by the organisation or co-ordination of scientific and technical studies on subjects of common concern;
∙the standardisation, at international level, of container glass products;
∙ecological studies;
c)the promotion of container glass recycling at European level;
d)the representation of the container glass sector in relation to the European Economic Community and within or in relation to all European or international organisations.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Consumers, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
